security: Revealing that AMLONG is typical could compromise code and sources. Quoting directly: 'TYPIC AMLONG'
summary: A classified message identifies Alfredo Davins as typical AMLONG. It requests that he be returned to CIA headquarters.
summary_one_paragraph: On October 8, 1963, a SECRET classified message was sent from the Director to Mexico City, identifying Alfredo Davins as typical AMLONG and requesting his return to CIA headquarters. The message's routing included FE/W, with informational copies to DDP, CI, CI/OPS, CI/OA, FI, FI/INT. 2, WH 7, RF, and VR.
title: Identify: Alfredo Davins
